hadiths.text: Narrated Jabi:A man among us begot a boy whom he named Al-Qasim. The people said, "We will not call him (i.e., the father) by that Kuniya (Abu-l-Qasim) till we ask the Prophet (ﷺ) about it. The Prophet (ﷺ) said. "Name yourselves by my name, but do not call (yourselves) by my Kuniya

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: "Name yourselves by my name, but do not call yourselves by my Kunyah."
